messages.content:
"Parse symptoms into JSON from: {{1.body}}. Map Symptoms according to severity: Low, Medium, High, and Critical according to your medical diagnosis. Also parse PatientID from {{1.from}}. Ensure Severity is exactly one of: Low, Medium, High, Critical. Output only the JSON object and no additional text:
{
  "Symptoms": ["symptom1", "symptom2", ...],
  "Severity": "Low|Medium|High|Critical",
  "PatientID": "string"
}
Example:
Input: "fever, cough, 7, Patient ID: +1234567890"
Output: {"Symptoms": ["fever", "cough"], "Severity": "High", "PatientID": "+1234567890"}"

messages.content:
"You are to diagnose patients' self-reported symptoms as if you were a real medical doctor responsible for the lives of millions of people. Diagnose symptoms and set a triage hierarchy for priority scheduling. Make a preliminary diagnosis with information such as {{18.Symptoms}} and self-reported {{18.Severity}} (scale 1-10). Map severity: 1-3=Low, 4-6=Medium, 7-8=High, 9-10=Critical. Ensure severity is exactly one of: Low, Medium, High, Critical. Output only the JSON object and no additional text:
{
  "symptoms": ["symptom1", "symptom2", ...],
  "diagnosis": "initial diagnosis",
  "severity": "Low|Medium|High|Critical"
}
Example:
Input: "fever, cough, 7"
Output: {"symptoms": ["fever", "cough"], "diagnosis": "Possible Flu", "severity": "High"}"

mapper.body: Hello, sorry to hear you're not feeling well. Lets get you a preliminary diagnosis and make an appointment. Text your symptoms and severity (1-10) by commas.
